div.header: Pine Springs Preparatory Academy has implemented virtual learning from March 31 – May 15:
div.p: Please visit our Virtual Learning Tab for more information

p.strong: is a K-8 charter school located in Holly Springs, North Carolina serving over 800 students as of the Fall of 2020.

span.strong: PSPA Front Office Hours: Currently CLOSED

em.strong: Check out our quick-links for more info:

section.p: Did you hear the news? Pine Springs was one of six charter schools in the US to make the national honor roll for our positive school climate! Thank you to all the parents who nominated us! We are so glad that it shows how much we love your kids and love where we work!

a.title: Playground coming to PSPA this fall!
Playground coming to PSPA this fall!

h3.a: Playground coming to PSPA this fall!

section.p: Pioneer Families- have you heard the news? We raised $33,890.95 in the Fun Run and we were awarded a $33,000 grant towards our outdoor playground and play space!! The playground will include a climbing rope structure, slides, swings, a saucer swing, a modern twist to the oldie but goodie seesaw and merry-go-round, tetherball, permanent basketball hoops, a shaded outdoor classroom/ eating area, and much more! Thank you for your patience and support we know you will love what we have in store but for now you can view the rendering of what our plans are. Thanks again for all that helped make this happen!

p.strong: Pine Springs Preparatory Academy is dedicated to improving the lives of its students by providing authentic learning experiences in a collaborative, nurturing environment that will build a foundation for students’ success in school, career, and in life.

div.p: Students feel free to dress down in your Pioneer spirit wear shirt and school appropriate bottoms of your choice. Show your Pioneer Pride!
On college t-shirt day students can wear a college t-shirt of their choice to show their college allegiance.
Students may wear school-appropriate bottoms of their choice.
PSPA would like to thank all those that have served for our country’s freedom! Thank you!!
